document_data.mainbody: The '''Delimbiyr''', also known as the '''River Shining''',

Geography.Headwaters: The headwaters of the Delimbiyr River consisted of three streams. These were, named west to east, the [[River Aulantrar]], the [[River Starsilver]], and the [[Norlnryn]].

document_data.Fauna: The Delimbiyr River was full of [[szorp]] fish.
